text: Isomerida ruficornis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Henry Walter Bates in 1866. It is known from Brazil.BioLib.cz - Isomerida ruficornis. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1866
title: Isomerida ruficornis
